name: Blue Lemon
description:
Blue Lemon is a visual novel with a lot of animation to deliver its stories. It also has mini-games inside it (turn-based strategy game) to determine the flow of the story. If you like the turn-based strategy game with a lot of cutscenes and rich stories, Blue Lemon might just perfect for you!
In this game, you will play as Stefan Pierce, a teenager who suffers memory loss which makes him remember nothing but his name. Now let's find out what is exactly happen to you!

Total Story's Words: around 12.000 words
Total Play Time: 20-30 hours
